reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 178/17: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER

content.content: 1. The authority to make regulations relating to the following matters is delegated to the Minister: 1. The matters described in paragraph 2 of subsection 78 (1) of the Act as they relate to matters or things, for which the power to make regulations is delegated to the Minister. 2. The matters described in paragraphs 6, 7, 9, 11, 12, 14, 15, 16, 20, 21, 23 and 25 of subsection 78 (1) of the Act.
content.raw_html:
1. The authority to make regulations relating to the following matters is delegated to the Minister:

1. The matters described in paragraph 2 of subsection 78 (1) of the Act as they relate to matters or things, for which the power to make regulations is delegated to the Minister.

2. The matters described in paragraphs 6, 7, 9, 11, 12, 14, 15, 16, 20, 21, 23 and 25 of subsection 78 (1) of the Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
